website_summaries.verdict: A decent entry level skate, that holds up and is fairly comfortable, but not a high end speed skate.
pros: A good quality pair of skates for the price
Can hold up to every-day use
cons: The stopper is not as durable as it could be, and you might have to replace it sooner than you would like

customer_reviews.title: they are very comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: I've used them twice. they are very comfortable and light, move very well on the rink. i'm a beginner, so I can't say much with authority about the quality, but they seem ok. the stops are cheap hard plastic and wore quickly on my first run...i'm replacing them already with some $8 rubbery stops. Also, the toe of the boot wore off after one attempt to get a feel for the stop. all in all, I think they are ok for the price point, i'm enjoying them a lot for the price, but I wonder if I should have went with the Chicago Bullets that are much less in price.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH

customer_reviews.title: Fine for casual skating.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I"m rating them for what they are: entry level skates. Of course they do not compare to higher-end leather skates, and I assume that anyone at that end of the skating spectrum is not even looking here. So for the rest of us, they're comfortable, they roll, and they are synthetic, not leather. They come with all the adjustment nuts tightened down (and for several wheels I had to use a ratchet wrench to loosen them). So expect to loosen the wheel nuts almost from the start, and the trucks somewhat later, depending on your skating ability.
customer_reviews.author: breadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Use only for basic skating nothing more
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner skate, but thats it, only use for basic skating, I split mine in less than 4 months of use,, these have no durability, the toe stops are horrible and recommend replacing them with a more rubber compound to make them useful,,the boot itself was tight and were very uncomfortable after prolonged skating in them 2+ hours..
customer_reviews.author: Tokii

customer_reviews.title: they are wonderful but the only problem was that it was tighter ...
customer_reviews.text: I work at sonic drive-in and use my skates about 30 hours a week. At first there was minor discomfort as my feet had to adjust but now they feel wonderful. I've had the same pair for a year now and they are finally starting to fall apart and I'm about to order another pair. I know a year may not seem like much but remember I use them 5-6 days a week for at least 30 hours whether it is raining or sunhine.
customer_reviews.author: coolbeans621

customer_reviews.title: Smooth roller skating
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I chose these skates because of the price and color. I do not know much about the technical aspects of the correct skate for the right skating usage. I have not skated in a long time, was not sure about the size to order. I wear a size 8 in shoes. Ordered a size 8. They fit comfortable with very thick socks. Not much cushion so I plan to put in a sole. They are not made for outdoors according to the instructions that came with it. But that's where I use them. Smooth skating. Met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: BAR

customer_reviews.title: Decent entry level skates
customer_reviews.text: Boot is comfortable enough. No blisters after skating for a couple hours. The wheels are garbage and must be replaced, no grip on the rink. I replaced the bearings while I was at it. Great value though and exactly as expected. Just expect to change the wheels out yourself. Compare what the cost will be when you do. I ended up spending more than the other pair of skates I was looking at. The stopper is junk too but I don't really use it much.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Snakes

customer_reviews.title: only worn twice and they look great otherwise. Not sure why it would peel so
customer_reviews.text: One skate the toe has already peeled off, only worn twice and they look great otherwise. Not sure why it would peel so easily
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Peck

customer_reviews.title: First time owner of skates
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my son and he was happy to own his very first pair of skates. Size 12 in men hopefully his feet has stopped growing since that’s the reason I never purchased any before now.
customer_reviews.author: Dee W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son- he loved it. Fits just right with a smooth ride. He hated skated before, but asked for his own to learn. Put these on and kept practicing and now enjoys it more and is better than before. I know the skates themselves didn't make him skate, but it's good to have the right gear.
customer_reviews.author: Krista A.

customer_reviews.title: Totally fun
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a sweet automobile with twenty two inch rims
customer_reviews.author: Adam Quillen

customer_reviews.title: they were perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another brand to replace my son's first set of Pacer skates and immediately regretted it, and jumped right back and purchased these instead. As usual, they were perfect for him. Size is pretty true and unlike other brands of skates, the wheels need no adjustment right out of the box. They roll smooth. I won't be duped again. Both my kids wear Pacer skates and the quality for the price is unmatched.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Goltermann

customer_reviews.title: These skates really fit good.. The most comfortable i have ever wore
customer_reviews.text: These skates really fit good.. The most comfortable i have ever wore. I did need to change the wheels and bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Del B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but don't use the stopper to much.
customer_reviews.text: Good skates. Issue is the front stopper will wear out very fast! After the first time using it worn down 1/8 inch while skating at an indoor rollar rink! So I tend to try to stop without using it to much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates!
customer_reviews.text: Great skates! My son loves them! The are good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MCol

customer_reviews.title: These things are very functional and they are also pretty foxy. A good buy
customer_reviews.text: These things are very functional and they are also pretty foxy. A good buy, though more expensive than I think they should be.
customer_reviews.author: S. Minden

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner skate. I wear a women's 9 Only a little bit big. I have wide feet so width comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Blazys

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend like them, comes with instructions on how to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend like them, comes with instructions on how to adjust wheels if needed. Shipped really fast!! He did get a blister on his ankle after an hour of skating, but this can probably be fixed with some longer socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were nice quality, BUT the wheels were overtightened
customer_reviews.text: These were nice quality, BUT the wheels were overtightened, which squashed the bearings. I had to return them. What a shame...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Love them!!! Idk why people complain it's not that hard to lossen the wheels but mine where just fine great sk8ts
customer_reviews.author: Silas Queen

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy for racing skates
customer_reviews.text: My son said they hurt his feet they roll weird. He has no interest in them
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Happy Skater
customer_reviews.text: I love my skates. I will be buying other wheels but they are just what I ordered. I thank God for avenues like Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my skates
customer_reviews.text: I never would of thought of ordering skates online. Im glad i did because there great. There cheap and fun. Next time i need skates this is most definitely were im gettin them from
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Publisher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves them, he goes skating twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good skate but needs a better padding
customer_reviews.text: The padding on the inside seems to be a little thin could be better but all in all it was a good buy would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price. Shipping was fast. No complaints at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is still learning how to skate and when he put these on he instantly started skating better!
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves them! He is still learning how to skate and when he put these on he instantly started skating better!
customer_reviews.author: Galaxy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are terrible, the barrings don't spin and they are very uncomfortable. I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scott tucker

customer_reviews.title: If you or your kids like to go skating
customer_reviews.text: If you or your kids like to go skating, but hate the skates provided at a skating rink, you will love these. My 14 year old son said these are great skates.
customer_reviews.author: Kpotawatomi

customer_reviews.title: The product looks like really good quality so I can't wait to break ...
customer_reviews.text: Only took 2 days to deliver & now I'm ready to skate! The product looks like really good quality so I can't wait to break these babies in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Bonner

product_meta.title: Pacer Black Mach-5 GTX500 Quad Speed Roller Skates w/ 2 Pair of Laces (Gray & Black)
product_meta.description: The Mach-5 GTX500 quad skate features a comfortable boot with lots of padding for long hours at the rink. Perfect beginner quad speed skate or an entry level roller derby skate.
feature_bullets: BOOTS - Black Pacer GTX-500 - Comfortable Speed Boots from Pacer with a Cinch Strap
BEARINGS - BEVO ABEC-3 High Quality CHROME STEEL AAA Rated!
PLATES - Zytel Nylon - Great lightweight plates with Double Action Trucks!
WHEELS - Black Pacer Mach-5 63mm x 35mm All Purpose Grip Speed Wheels
